title: "What is the technique of "bi-location" and how can the power of the eye be utilized
first_phrase: This text delves into the ancient and mysterious practice of fascination, or the power of the eye to influence and heal others. The author and his friend Max become intimately acquainted with this technique through their studies with Virgilio T. and Prof. Erminio from Pisa. They discover that in order to possess this power, one must practice disciplined self-development and self-improvement. The text explores the history and practical applications of fascination, from healing to leadership and creating instantaneous hypnosis. The power of the eye is a profound and potent tool that shapes our perception and influences our world.
content: It does not end here, however. Though we have been introduced to the technique, we can personally attest to the fact that there are still many obscure points in need of clarification, as regards the degree of potency of this hidden and extraordinary power. Fields of utilization of fascination “Fascination is actualized by a lucid and subtle virtue which the heat of the heart gives birth to as one equipped with a purer blood. This heat is emanated in the form of rays which, emitted by open eyes fixing their gaze with strong imaginative power, ultimately produce a wound in the object of their look, touch the heart, and succeed in afflicting the other person’s heart and spirit, either with love or hatred, with envy, melancholia, or some other kindred emotional force. Feeling the attraction of love is a phenomenon which takes place when two people frequently eye one another through a direct, intense look. In that case, visual rays, mutually radiating, meet one another, and light is wedded to light. It is at that point that spirits are conjoined together, and that the superior light, by indoctrinating the lower one, shimmers through the eyes, and races to penetrate into the inner spirit, the one that is rooted in the heart; it is in that fashion that an amorous conflagration is stirred into being.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the power of fascination through the eyes has been utilized for centuries for various purposes including everyday persuasion, healing, and personal growth. The eye is a powerful organ that can be trained and its power harnessed through specific techniques, such as holding a fixed and penetrating gaze. The eye is also symbolically significant in various cultures, representing knowledge, intuition, and higher consciousness. While the power of the eye to fascinate is undeniable, it is important to exercise caution and use it ethically and responsibly. The journey of mastering the art of fascination through the eyes is an ongoing one that requires discipline, practice, and a deep understanding of oneself.
